dict.acceptation: 相，周相；阶段；[物理学]相位；方面，侧面；

sent.orig: The development process of ERP includes basic MRP phase, close-loop phase, MRP phase, and ERP phase.
sent.trans: ERP的发展经历了基本MRP阶段、闭环MRP阶段、MRP阶段和ERP阶段。

sent.orig: This system consists of phase-measuring instrument, digital phase shifting generator and phase three network components.
sent.trans: 此系统由相位测量仪、数字式移相信号发生器和移相网络三部分组成。

sent.orig: And recommend the single-phasesingle-phase Converter and single-phase to three-phase Converter that transform from the Matrix-Converter.
sent.trans: 还介绍了由33矩阵变换器改变的单相-单相变换器和单相-三相变换器。

sent.orig: The phase fraction of gas-liquid two-phase flow includes void fraction and phase holdup of liquid mixture.
sent.trans: 气液两相流的相份额包括含气率与液相中各分相的含率。

sent.orig: Its mineralization can be divided into three phases, deposition phase, metamorphism phase and reformation phase.
sent.trans: 将成矿划分为沉积、变质及改造三阶段。
